id: Walking backwards can boost your short-term memory

Volunteers in a study did better in a memory test if they walked backwards before taking it – or if they simply imagined moving backwards.Aleksandar Aksentijevic at the University of Roehampton, UK, and colleagues asked 114 volunteers to watch a video in which a woman has her bag stolen by a passer-by.
